Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/writing/1850161188387291136/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "Write article with Hyperlinks"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/writing/1850161188387291136/)_"
---
Write a comprehensive blog post titled "[PROMPT]" The blog should revolve around the keyword "[VARIABLE1]" and related terms throughout the content. Additionally, add a hyperlink to "[VARIABLE1]" (pointing to "[VARIABLE2]") every time the exact phrase "[VARIABLE1]" is mentioned in the blog post. Moreover, include at least five hyperlinks to related terms or synonyms of "[VARIABLE1]," each leading to a relevant page on the website "[VARIABLE2]." Brand name is "[VARIABLE3]", You have to give Hyperlink it too. Link out within the 2nd and 3rd paragraph to helpful resources, not at the end, to the resources.

Please ensure that all hyperlinks are in plain text format without any image-related tags. The Blog should also don't have any image-related tags. The output should be in Markdown format and written in the [TARGETLANGUAGE] language.


[VARIABLE1:Keyword]
[VARIABLE2:Internal Link]
[VARIABLE3:Brand Name]
